db-user-manager.insert-user: INSERT INTO FTP_USER (userid, userpassword, homedirectory, enableflag, writepermission, idletime, uploadrate, downloadrate) VALUES ('{userid}', '{userpassword}', '{homedirectory}', '{enableflag}', '{writepermission}', {idletime}, {uploadrate}, {downloadrate})
db-user-manager.update-user: UPDATE FTP_USER SET userpassword='{userpassword}', homedirectory='{homedirectory}', enableflag={enableflag}, writepermission={writepermission}, idletime={idletime}, uploadrate={uploadrate}, downloadrate={downloadrate} WHERE userid='{userid}'
db-user-manager.select-user: SELECT userid, userpassword, homedirectory, enableflag, writepermission, idletime, uploadrate, downloadrate FROM FTP_USER WHERE userid = '{userid}'
db-user-manager.select-all-users: SELECT userid FROM FTP_USER ORDER BY userid
db-user-manager.is-admin: SELECT userid FROM FTP_USER WHERE userid='{userid}' AND userid='admin'
db-user-manager.authenticate: SELECT userpassword from FTP_USER WHERE userid='{userid}'
